6. 心灵控制器(psychic dominator)(yuri) 65 (13.21%)  luoieex 2 # 大中小发表于 2008-1-4 07:26 PM 只看该作者分享转播

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Greek psukhikos (see psyche)

entry.def: If you believe that someone is psychic or has psychic powers, you believe that they have strange mental powers, such as being able to read the minds of other people or to see into the future.

example.ex: Trevor helped police by using his psychic powers.
example.tran: 特雷弗用他的通灵能力帮助了警方。

entry.def: Psychic means relating to ghosts and the spirits of the dead.

example.ex: He declared his total disbelief in psychic phenomena.
example.tran: 他宣称自己完全不相信鬼魂现象。

entry.def: Psychic means relating to the mind rather than the body.

example.ex: These truths cause individuals much psychic pain.
example.tran: 这些真相给个体带来巨大的精神痛苦。

means.word_mean: 1. a person apparently sensitive to things beyond the natural range of perception
1. pertaining to forces or mental processes outside the possibilities defined by natural or scientific laws;
2. affecting or influenced by the human mind;
3. outside the sphere of physical science;
